vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting the renewal of and an amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 2170 for an open enrollment charter school use on property zoned an RR Regional Retail District, north of West Camp Wisdom Road and west of Interstate 35E Freeway
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval for a two-year period, subject to a site plan, a traffic management plan, and conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval for a two-year period, subject to a traffic management plan and conditions
Z201-134(HC)
